profile:
I have 18 years of heating and air-conditioning experience. I've been working in the field since I arrived in Canada (2018) and established my company at 2021. I'm a G2 gas technician and 313D residential heating and air-conditioning technician certificate holder and registered as Independent Designer with BCIN with Ministry of Municipal Affairs.
I cover Hamilton, Burlington, Milton, Oakville, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto area and some other cities depends on the job size. I do the following:
- All types of gas furnaces and air-conditioning installation, service & repairs.
- All types of air filters installation.
- Water heaters and tankless water tanks installation and repairs.
- HRV's installation.

profile: Simply Green Home Services was founded on the premise of helping Canadian Homeowners increase their home’s energy efficiency and subsequently reduce energy consumption without sacrificing their quality of life or living standards. My Simply Green offers a wide range of options to help you get you equipped with reliable, top-quality, high efficiency heating and cooling. We don’t want you to ever have to worry about not having a comfortable living environment or readily-available hot water. The satisfaction of everyone who joins the Simply Green family is our top priority, and we will strive to keep the high level of satisfaction for many years after you join. We are constantly growing our Technical and Support teams in order to make sure there will always be someone to provide the personal service you deserve.

profile:
At GTAHeat.ca Inc. we specialize in residential and commercial installations of hydronic snow melt and floor heating systems.
We organize and coordinate between all trades relevant to the installation, can cover everything from gas, plumbing, concrete and Agilasilica overpours, landscaping and HVAC. We are your one stop solution provider and can generate certified and stamped mechanical designs, heat loss calculations and loop layouts, supplemental heating and air conditioning. We also provide fully licensed residential/commercial plumbing and HVAC work. With us as the single point contact there is no need for you to coordinate between trades and solve scheduling conflicts. You give us the directions and we provide you with a turn-key installation.


Absolutely Guaranteed - No Questions asked warranty

Canadian Hydronics Council Certified designs and installation services.

Residential and commercial radiant floor heating, snow melt, space heaters, air handlers, radiators and pool heater installations.
Whole house floor heating or just a basement?
No job is too small or too big for us.
All systems tailored to your needs and budget.
Anywhere you need to heat we can do it with hydronic systems.


Design Services:
BCIN stamped residential heat loss calculations.
Detailed radiant heating boiler room designs and drawings.
BCIN Stamped loop-layout drawings for building permits.
Auditing of existing hydronic heating systems with written report of design and installation deficiencies.
In our FREE Quote you will find a detailed list of parts and components based on our hydronic designs and products for your project.

Please take a look at our FREE quotes form on https://GTAHeat.ca/quote-request
Check out our Portfolio: https://www.gtaheat.ca/portfolio-item

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us! Tel: 647 688 2669 Email: info@gtaheat.ca

Many references available.

Follow us on Instagram! @gtaheat.ca


Thank you for visiting,

GTAHeat.ca Inc.


Working from Niagara to Kingston and Cottage Country. Like Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Niagara Falls, Stoney Creek,
Vaughan, Richmond Hill, New Market, Barrie, Aurora, Caledon, Milton, Brantford, Hamilton, Cambridge, Kitchener, Guelph, Brampton, Toronto, Scarborough, Uxbridge, Aurora, Pickering, Oshawa and surroundings.

profile:
Incepted in 2004, My Home Comfort aims at offering home owners enduring comfort and peace of mind through worry-free HVAC installations, repairs and maintenance.

With a wide spectrum of air conditioners, water heaters, furnaces and humidifiers that stand for superior quality, we provide our customers with extensive solutions to meet their specific cooling, heating, air and water treatment needs.

What make our offerings more suitable and desirable are our financing programs that are designed to assist customers economically with their HVAC installation, maintenance and repairs.
services:
Air Conditioning
Replace, repair and maintain your cooling system with the assistance of experienced and trained technicians. Also, you can seek knowledgeable advice of our experts to find an ideal solution for your residential or commercial air conditioning needs.

Furnaces
Create a warm and comfy environment in your home in the cold winter season with the installation of a functional heating system. Ensure year-round comfort with our regular maintenance packages or repair the existing system to operate at peak efficiency.

Water Heaters
Keep your household functional with continuous supply of hot water through our same-day water heater installation and replacement service. With all our professionals certified and trained in HVAC systems and maintenance, you can rest assured that your project is in safe hands.

Humidifiers
Whether you seek regular servicing or professional installation, our in-house team of engineers can maintain and service all makes and models of humidification systems with minimal inconvenience and maximum satisfaction.

Thermostats
While air conditioners, furnaces, humidifiers and water heaters are a common source of home comfort, thermostats have an essential role to play when it comes to operating these systems.

A thermostat activates or deactivates cooling and heating systems to control the temperature within the home. However, the functionality of thermostats varies from model to model and choosing the right can help you save a lot of energy and money on utility bills.

Gas Lines
When it comes to gas line installations and repairs, quality and safety remains inevitable. We specialise in safe gas line repair and replacement and are committed to fast service, fair pricing and 24/7 support.

In addition, all our products and services are backed by limited warranties that guarantee complete satisfaction and peace of mind. We also offer different financing options for our customers to fulfill their HVAC needs without breaking the bank.
payment_method: Cash, Check, e-transfer, Money Order and Credit Card
warranty_terms: 10 Years on Parts/ 2 year on Labour

profile:
Riteflow Heating and Air Solutions has been a consistently-growing business for over 8 years. Operating all over Toronto and York Region, we have created a name for ourselves by providing excellent customer service and demonstrating extensive technical knowledge.

Our technicians are experts in HVAC service, installation, maintenance and 24-hour repair. This was attained through years of classroom and field training (which is on-going).

Our technicians have diplomas through George Brown College in HVAC engineering, both residential and commercial/industrial gas licenses through the Technical Standards and Safety Authority, air conditioning licenses through the Ontario College of Trades, as well as extensive training in electrical and carbon monoxide safety.

Your business is always appreciated, please do not hesitate to contact us for all your HVAC needs!

profile:
In 2005, Lucky Air Climate Control Ltd. began offering commercial and residential HVAC services in the Greater Toronto Area. Based in Scarborough, our owner has a decade of experience providing quality installation and repair services at your offices, homes and condo buildings. We try to provide maximum comfort and energy savings for our customers.

In addition to our commercial and residential HVAC services, we are a trusted resource for gas piping (BBQs, pool heaters, fireplaces, stoves and more). Our owner has more than a decade of experience working on condo buildings, commercial offices and residential property. Trust Lucky Air Climate Control Ltd. to handle all your projects and emergency needs; give us a call to learn more about our service and get a quote today.

Call us today to schedule an appointment.

profile:
The Canadian climate certainly isn’t kind to your HVAC system. During the harsh winter months, frigid temperatures ensure your furnace or boiler is operating at its maximum limits to keep you warm. When summer comes around, the heat has you blasting cool air consistently throughout your home. All of that takes its toll, and eventually, you could be left with an HVAC system that fails at an inopportune time. Ensure that doesn’t happen by giving Precision HVAC Mechanics Inc a call today!

Whether you’re looking to install a new air conditioner or repair an older furnace, we’re equipped to provide HVAC services in Brampton. Bought a new air conditioner after your old one gave out? Let us take the installation off your hands! Are you left shivering in your home due to your boiler malfunctioning? Handling the problem yourself may only make matters worse. Licensed and insured, we’re able to safely and efficiently solve your heating crisis.

Commercial HVAC Service
Looking to add a new rooftop unit to your business? Need a heating or cooling unit for your construction site? We offer commercial HVAC services, too! Keep your clients comfortable in your building with a regularly-maintained HVAC system. We’re also able to provide an energy assessment for your business, giving you an expert recommendation to help you save on your next energy bill.

Don’t wait until your HVAC system fails. We’re open 7 days a week, so give us a call today to let us keep your system running smoothly!
